RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the border checkpoint: border patrol checkpoint on I-35 near Laredo, Texas

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States of America: country making an appeal from orders suppressing evidence and responding to the appeal, seeking review of the district court's judgment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo, Texas: location where a federal grand jury returned an indictment and where Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso was stopped by a border patrol checkpoint, 15 miles south of which the checkpoint is located on I-35, birthplace of Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso, site of a federal grand jury
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.border patrol checkpoint on I-35 near La: checkpoint where Raul Rafael Arce-Jasso was initially stopped and questioned by Agent Jesus Garcia and where his detention was argued to be unconstitutionally lengthy
